mapper.select: select owc.id, owc.out_wh_id outWhId, owc.combin_name`name`, bom.bom_no number, owc.qty, ifnull(owc.already_out_wh_qty, 0) qcQty, true idClass from ope_out_wh_combin_b owc inner join ope_production_combin_bom bom on owc.production_combin_bom_id = bom.id and bom.dr = 0 where owc.dr = 0 and owc.out_wh_id = #{outWhId}

select owc.id, owc.out_wh_id outWhId, owc.combin_name`name`, bom.bom_no number, owc.qty, ifnull(owc.already_out_wh_qty, 0) qcQty, true idClass from ope_out_wh_combin_b owc inner join ope_production_combin_bom bom on owc.production_combin_bom_id = bom.id and bom.dr = 0 where owc.dr = 0 and owc.id = #{productId}
